skyblock.command.island.success: Successfully created the island for player %s
skyblock.command.island.teleported: Teleported player %s as an island already exists
skyblock.command.regenisland.success: Successfully regenerated the island for player %s
skyblock.command.spawn.success: Teleported player %s to the spawn island
skyblock.command.world: The command cannot be used in a non-skyblock dimension
skyblock.command.noisland: An island for this player does not exist
skyblock.command.help.1: /island island <player> - creates a new island or teleports the player to their existing one if one exists
skyblock.command.help.2: /island spawn - teleports the user to the spawn island
skyblock.command.help.3: /island visit <player|playerUuid> - teleports the user to the specified player's island
skyblock.command.help.4: /island regen-island <player|playerUuid> - rebuilds the specified player's island
